fi.aapzu.pentago.game

Class Pentago

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.aapzu.pentago.game.Pentago
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Pentago
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The mother class of the game.
    Author:
    Aapeli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pentago()
      Creates a new game with a Board, two Players and the bookkeeping of whose turn it is.
      Pentago(Pentago other)
      Copy-constructor to create a clone of the Pentago.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears everything in the game. Starts new game.

      • addMarble

        public void addMarble(int x,
                      int y)
        Sets a Marble to the Board. Takes it from the MarbleCollection of the Player in turn. Throws PentagoGameRuleException if a Tile hasn't been rotated first.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate of the Marble
        y - the Y coordinate of the Marble

      • rotateTile

        public void rotateTile(int x,
                       int y,
                       Direction d)
        Rotates the given Tile and gives the turn to the other Player. Throws PentagoGameRuleException if a Marble hasn't been set to the Board first.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate of the Tile
        y - the X coordinate of the Tile
        d - the Direction

      • isEven

        public boolean isEven()
        Tells if the game has no any possible moves anymore.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • whoseTurn

        Tells whose turn it is.
        Returns:

        Returns:
        int whose turn it is currently

      • checkLines

        public Line checkLines()
        Checks if the Board contains any lines (length 5). Returns the Player, and the coordinates of the line, if one is found, otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        line or null

      • setBoard

        public void setBoard(Board board)
        Sets the Board. Also replaces the new LineChecker with a new one.
        Parameters:
        board - the new Board
